author: awiner
msg: Implement ActionSource2 on command and selectInput base classes

author: eliast
msg: - Changed FeedModel to support tags in the request params
- Refactored getTags() and getPopularTags() in SiteModel,PageModel and WeblogEntryData
- Added scriptaculous for tag type-ahead in WeblogEdit.jsp
- Removed Tags tab in frontpage theme, moved it to the sidebar only
- Renamed getTagSet() to getTags() and getTags() to getTagsAsString()
- Updated Velocity macros to the changes and simplified #showTagCloud macro
- Solved world hunger (mostly in Latin America, Africa is next) [jk]

author: awiner
msg: Fix validity of 1.2 faces-config.xml file.  Add support for ActionSource2 - or, really, for attrs that have one name in the JSP tag (action) and another on the component (actionExpression)

author: rfeng
msg: Add SNAPSHOT versions for AXIOM so that it's compatible with Axis2 SNAPSHOT

author: fhanik
msg: Fixes to the clustering code, some changes in StandardSession broke func, this has been fixed.
consolidated the use of a nested <Manager> element
